name: Cadee Software, Inc.
description: Operator of a social community for golfers. The company has developed an online platform through which golfers can discover new courses, share and compare golf scores, track golf activities of other members and calculate golf statistics.
one_liner: Operator of a social community for golfers. The company has developed an online platform through which golfers can discover new courses, share and compare golf scores, track golf activities of other members and calculate golf statistics.
